bad_request.message: Invalid request. Please check your input.

unauthorized_api_request.message: Unauthorized API request. Please check your API key.

resource_not_found.message: Resource not found. Please check if the resource identifier passed in the URL is valid and try again.

unsupported_media_type.message: Unsupported Media Type. Content-Type header should be application/json.

invalid_credentials.message: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password.

user_already_exists.message: User with the provided email already exists.

invalid_params.message: At least one parameter is invalid or missing.

forbidden_api_request.message: Forbidden API request. You do not have the necessary permissions.

salesforce_resource_not_found.message: Resource not found from salesforce. Please check if the resource identifier passed in the URL is valid and try again.

salesforce_forbidden_api_request.message: Forbidden API request. You do not have necessary permission to take that action in salesforce.
